message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire this exceptional product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll find it valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can we meet in the middle?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $12000 is a bit below my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $15000. This is my final counteroffer for now.
I'm still interested in the product, but $13500 is my maximum. Can we meet in the middle?
I can see you're serious about the product, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $14500. This is my next best offer.
I'm getting close to my budget, so I'll meet you at $14000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to accept $14000. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $14250. This is my last offer, and I'm not going any lower.
I've reached my budget limit, so I'll stick with my previous offer of $14000. I'm not willing to go any higher.
